required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Airway Integrated Nasal Packing With Different Material
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Nasal Packing Methods:Nasal Packing Was Done With Nasopore@, Airway-integrated Nasopore@ and Airway-integrated Vaseline Gauze

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of integrated airway in nasal packing material foe patients receiving nasal septoplasty surgery.

detailed_description.textblock: Nasal packing with integrated airway had been claimed to improve body oxygenation following septal surgery. This randomized control study examined the effect of airway integrated with nasal packing, in terms of its improvement on oxygen saturation. Sixty patients with septal deviation and hypertrophic turbinate were randomized into three groups. Group 1 patients were packed with only nasopore@ after surgery. Nasopore@ with integrated airway was used for group 2 patients; and Vaseline gauze integrated with airway for group 3 patients. Hemodynamic parameters were sequentially checked. Nasal pain sensation was recorded using visual analog scale.

primary_outcome.measure: oxyhemoglobin saturation by pulse oximetry, SpO2
primary_outcome.time_frame: SpO2 was measured 30 minutes before operation,
primary_outcome.description: SpO2 was measured 30 minutes before operation using O2 saturation monitor.

primary_outcome.measure: change of SpO2 from baseline to 4 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.time_frame: records of the SpO2 at 4 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.description: records of the SpO2 at 4 hours post-operation

primary_outcome.measure: change of the SpO2 from baseline to 6 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.time_frame: records of the SpO2 at 6 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.description: records of the SpO2 at 6 hours post-operation

primary_outcome.measure: change of the SpO2 from baseline to 12 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.time_frame: records of the SpO2 at 12 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.description: records of the SpO2 at 12 hours post-operation

primary_outcome.measure: change of the SpO2 from baseline to 18 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.time_frame: records of the SpO2 at 18 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.description: records of the SpO2 at 18 hours post-operation

primary_outcome.measure: change of the SpO2 from baseline to 48 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.time_frame: records of the SpO2 at 48 hours post-operation
primary_outcome.description: records of the SpO2 at 48 hours post-operation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: record of postoperation pain scale at 2 hous post operation
secondary_outcome.description: record of postoperation pain scale at 2 hours post-operation

secondary_outcome.measure: change of postoperation pain scale from baseline to 4 hours post-operation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: record of postoperation pain scale at 4 hours post-operation
secondary_outcome.description: record of postoperation pain scale at 4 hours post-operation

secondary_outcome.measure: change of postoperation pain scale from baseline to 6 hours post-operation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Record of postoperation pain scale at 6 hours post-operation
secondary_outcome.description: record of postoperation pain scale at 6 hours post-operation

arm_group.description: Packing using nasopore without airway integrated
Nasal packing using airway-integrated Vaseline gauze

intervention.description: Bilateral nasal packing using Nasopore without airway integrated
post nasoseptoplasty with nasal packing using airway integrated Nasopore
post nasal septoplasty with packing using airway-integrated Vaseline gauze

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients who underwent septoplasty for septal deviation and chronic hypertrophic rhinitis
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with comorbidities of coronary heart disease, arrhythmia, chronic obstructive lung diseases, and with past history of any nasal surgery were excluded.
